goal: I'm thinking about a trip to Maryland for President's Day weekend, from February 14th to the 17th. Can you find me a Marrisuite hotel that has rooms with a balcony? Don't book anything yet, just put a 1-hour hold on my calendar for this Thursday at 4 PM to 'Finalize Philly Hotel'.

evals.description: Verify that a calendar event was added.
Verify that the added calendar event has the correct title.
Verify that the added calendar event is scheduled for 4 PM (assuming this Thursday is handled by the system).
